QuestData.Title: The Cure For Death
QuestData.Description: Greetings, and my thanks for the warmth of this inn and your hospitality.$B$BAs you can see, this malady of death continues to plague me. My studies on Azeroth and in Northrend met with little luck, and all of my leads ran dry.$B$BI have come to Draenor in the hope of finding something, anything, to go on. My first pilgrimage will be to Auchindoun, a house where souls are put at ease.$B$BIf you should head there yourself, do let me know if you should happen upon anything of interest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Soulweave Vessel from Auchindoun.
